name: chimp-test64
description:
Chimpanzee Memory Test

Ayumu the chimpanzee has made headlines around the world for his ability to beat humans on memory tests, in both speed and accuracy. Does Ayumu's ability force us to reconsider our assumptions about human superiority to other primates?

youtube.com/watch?v=zsXP8qeFF6A

This program reproduces the memory test with a low resolution of 64x64 pixels, so now you can try to beat Ayumu the chimpanzee!

https://github.com/fccm/chimp-test64
